channel.title: BBC News on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in BBC News on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: BBC to Launch Daily News Podcast ‘The Global Story,’ Which Co-Host Asma Khalid Says Is Aimed at ‘Connecting the Dots in Our Strange Political Times’
item.description: The BBC is making a new play for news-hungry listeners with “The Global Story,” a daily podcast focused on the intersection of news “where the world and the United States meet.&#8221
